attributes.title: almost died...

attributes.review: This app is atrocious,despite taking exactly 8 days, 12 hours, 6 minutes, and 45 seconds to download. Once it finally downloaded, I opened the app, and it released such a high frequency that my dog is now deaf. He was so startled by the frequency that he started frantically running around in circles and he got dizzy and tipped over my jar of battery acid, and now heâ€™s blind as well. Due to the excruciating pain he was facing he started jumping around and ended twisting the stove knob all the way to very high and the gas and battery acid reacted together to create a nuclear explosion. My entire neighborhood was wiped out, unknowingly thanks to Donaldâ€™s Stupid App. I only survived because I used my dog and my morbidly obese cat as shields to protect me from the explosions. For weeks on end all Iâ€™ve heard is pure agony and screams. I now have PTSD and every time I hear a loud noise go off I immediately burst into tears and reminisce on what was. Iâ€™ve gone to therapy, and even discussed my embarrassing pain with strangers and nothing helps anymore. I just want to be happy, I want to know what a real human connection is.The 4th if July was pure tragic and displeasure the whole night. On a brighter side luckily my human sized turtle also survived the explosion. And now she is my new love, for she is all I know. Sheâ€™s my motivation to get stronger and get passed my traumatic experience. With these memories of pure disparity and tragedy, I demand that Mr. Donald J. Trump, the peopleâ€™s president cause he sure as hell ainâ€™t mine, buy me a new home, a new Tibetan Mastiff dog, a new family, and give me the right to marry my turtle, without being looked at in a weird and inhuman way. All I say is if you donâ€™t want to experience such a horrifying and traumatic experience that I have please do not download such app. #Bernie2020
